title: 著作財產權人不明著作利用許可申請規費收費準則
title_en: Regulations for Application Fee Concerning Licensing of Works for the Use of Works of Unknown Owner of Copyrights
short_name: Regulations for Application Fee Concerning Licensing of Works for the Use of Wor
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 行政＞經濟部＞智慧財產權目. Articles extracted: 3.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本準則依規費法第十條規定訂定之。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 著作財產權人不明著作利用許可申請規費，每件著作新臺幣五千元。
